description: This type represents a notification that is sent when a threshold has been crossed.

id.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

notificationType.description: Discriminator for the different notification types. Shall be set to "ThresholdCrossedNotification " for this notification type.

subscriptionId.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

timeStamp.description: Date-time stamp.  Representation: String formatted according to IETF RFC 3339.

thresholdId.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

crossingDirection.description: The enumeration CrossingDirectionType shall comply with the provisions.   Acceptable Values are: UP - The threshold was crossed in upward direction. DOWN - The threshold was crossed in downward direction.

objectInstanceId.description: An identifier with the intention of being globally unique.

performanceMetric.description: Performance metric associated with the threshold.

performanceValue.description: Value of the metric that resulted in threshold crossing. See note.

_links.description: Links to resources related to this notification.

subscription.description: This type represents a link to a resource.

objectInstance.description: This type represents a link to a resource.

threshold.description: This type represents a link to a resource.
